snippet: The film centers on a group of men who walk the length of Manhattan in a vain attempt to recapture the euphoria of their early 20s.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews film Growing Up and Other Lies, directed by Darren Grodsky and Danny Jacobs.
lead_paragraph: The film centers on a group of men who walk the length of Manhattan in a vain attempt to recapture the euphoria of their early 20s.

headline.main: Review: ‘Growing Up and Other Lies’ Stares Down the Advent of Adulthood
headline.print_headline: Block by Block, the Man-Boy’s Guide to Manhattan
